title: Light Bearers: The Awakening
description: This first installment to the Light Bearers series introduces us to sisters Sarah and Amelia, who were orphaned at a young age and taken in by their wealthy uncle who has given them the best of everything. Amelia embraces their new life, but Sarah struggles to ever feel truly at home. Years after her parents' death, Sarah makes a startling discovery that plunges her into a darkness she never knew existed, one that will threaten to destroy her relationship with Amelia forever.If Sarah's instincts are right, there may not be anyone she can trust. But on an unexpected family vacation, Sarah meets a stranger who reveals a power within her she didn't know she had, and one she'll have to master to survive.
author: Mindy Hite
